0.regex: /<a class="short-title" href="(.*?)" title="(.*?)">[.|\s\S]*?<div title="Год выхода"><span class="fa fa-calendar"><\/span>(.*?)<\/div>/

1.regex: /<a href="(.*?)" title="(.*?)">[.|\s\S]*?<span class="anime-year"><a class="text-link-gray text-underline" href=".*?">(.*?)<\/a><\/span>/

2.regex: /<a class="movie-item__link" href="(.*?)">[.|\s\S]*?<div class="movie-item__title" title="(.*?)">[.|\s\S]*?<div class="movie-item__meta ws-nowrap">[\s]*<span>(.*?)<\/span>/
